title: Poca Poca Taiwan!
alternative_title: ぽかぽかたいわん！ ; Pokapoka Taiwan! ; Poka Poka Taiwan!
status: ぽかぽかたいわん！ ; Pokapoka Taiwan! ; Poka Poka Taiwan!
description:
Description :
        I spent my high school life in Taiwan.Anna Sakurakoji attended high school in Taiwan due to her parent's transfer.She was unable to communicate with the students around her because she did not understand Chinese, however, she meets a girl, Misuzu Minami, who loves manga and anime and speaks Japanese, and comes into contact with Taiwanese culture and customs.
